nodeList.loreText: Never fear, the bear is here.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Transform into a bear gaining 4 new skills. Mana does not regenerate. You return to human form when your mana bar depletes.

nodeList.description: While in Werebear Form, nearby minions have increased attack speed, cast speed, movement speed, and critical strike chance.
nodeList.nodeDescription: While in Werebear Form, nearby minions have [8%] increased attack speed, cast speed, movement speed and critical strike chance per point.

node.loreText: Never fear, the bear is here.
node.nodeDescription: Transform into a bear gaining 4 new skills. Mana does not regenerate. You return to human form when your mana bar depletes.

nodeList.description: When you kill an enemy with {Ravage,} you have a chance to create a random totem that you are specialized in.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you kill an enemy with Ravage, you have an [8%] chance per point to create a random totem that you are specialized in.

node.description: While in Werebear Form, nearby minions have increased attack speed, cast speed, movement speed, and critical strike chance.
node.nodeDescription: While in Werebear Form, nearby minions have [8%] increased attack speed, cast speed, movement speed and critical strike chance per point.

node.loreText: Never fear, the bear is here.
node.nodeDescription: Transform into a bear gaining 4 new skills. Mana does not regenerate. You return to human form when your mana bar depletes.

node.description: {Ravage} critical strikes grant you health and refund the mana and health cost of Ravage.
node.nodeDescription: Critical hits with Ravage restore [15] health per point and refunds the cost of your Ravage.

node.description: {Ravage} hits deal more damage against bleeding enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Ravage also has a health cost in addition to its mana cost.
node.nodeDescription:
Ravage also costs [20] health to use per point.

Ravage does [30%] more damage per point against bleeding enemies.

node.description: While in Werebear Form, melee attacks have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.
node.nodeDescription: While in Werebear Form, melee attacks have +[20%] bleed chance per point.
